title: Cavernous malformation located medially and deeply in the brain may be prone to false lateralization in cavernous malformation-associated epilepsy
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Keisuke Hatano, Keishiro Sato, Tomohiro Nakamura, Ryuya Hotta, Shingo Numoto, Ayataka Fujimoto
